About

Hello

My name is Charandeep Singh. I have completed my BCA degree in 2024. As a dedicated web developer with a specialization in front-end technologies, I bring a keen eye for design and a passion for creating seamless user experiences. My expertise lies in crafting responsive, dynamic interfaces that not only meet client specifications but also elevate user engagement. Currently, I am expanding my skill set to include back-end development, aiming to become a versatile full-stack developer. This continuous learning journey enables me to bridge the gap between design and functionality, ensuring cohesive and efficient web solutions. I thrive in collaborative environments and am committed to staying at the forefront of web development trends and best practices.

Projects

Responsive Instagram Clone

It is the clone of Instagram home page. It is fully responsive. Additionally, it includes hovering effect using transitions property of CSS. It is developed using HTML5 and CSS3 only.

Card Hovering Effect

It includes cards, when we hover over a card, it shows a smooth and amazing transition that is worth to watch. CSS variaibles are used in this to make it simple. It is developed using HTML5 and CSS3 only.

QR Code Generator

In this project, QR Code is generated corresponding to entered text or URL using API. It includes user-friendly interface. It is developed using HTML5, CSS3 and JavaScript.

Weather App

In In this project, In order to get weather details you have to enter name of city. It fetch data from weather API using async-await.

To-do List

In In this project, you can note down your works to do and if noted down work is finished then it can be marked as done. You can also remove work by clicking on cross button. It is designed with good-looking interface.

Simple Calculator

It is simple Calculator with beautiful interface which uses JavaScript to perform simple mathematical operations (Division, Multiplication, Addition, Subtraction).
